name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Highlighter Pro: Smart Folders, Notes & Research Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save & organize web content with multi-color highlighting, smart folders & beautiful notes. Create, organize with ease!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Highlighter helps you save and organize important text from any webpage. It's like having a digital marker that lets you highlight and save text you want to remember.
Simple to Use:

Select any text and highlight it with different colors
Save your highlights to keep them organized
Turn highlights into beautiful notes with custom themes
Quickly copy highlighted text to use elsewhere
Find your saved highlights easily

Perfect For:

Students taking notes from online articles
Saving important parts of web pages
Collecting information for research
Keeping track of interesting quotes
Organizing online reading material

Key Benefits:

Save time finding important information
Keep your research organized
Learn better by highlighting key points
Works smoothly on any website
Your data stays private and secure

Start highlighting important information today - it's quick, easy, and free!
